Description: Â 1/x % off total bill depending on group size (x).

Name: Carson’s American Bistro
Description: Offer only available on your birthday with valid ID - driver's license for adults and/or birth certificate for children. Offer only extends to the food portion of the bill (tax, gratuity and alcohol are excluded) and is based on the number of guests in your party; for example 2 people dining receive a discount of 50% off, 3 people dining 33% off, 4 people dining 25% off and so on. Not valid with any other promotion, offer or discount. [

Name: Grizzly Peak
Description: Free dessert with purchase of an entree and $10 gift cardÂ (that expires in 1 month)Â if your total bill exceeds $25.Â They used to give a Grizzly Peak logo pint glass but when I visited on 3/29/15, they said they don't do that anymore.

Name: Northside Grill

Name: Paesano's
Description: 1/2 off entree for birthday person when reservation is made, and always a free dessert with a sparkler in it.Â Also, if you sign up for Good Friends club, they mail a certificate for a free entree, with purchase of an entree, during your birthday month

Name: Palio
Description: Offer only available on your birthday with valid ID - driver's license for adults and/or birth certificate for children. Offer only extends to the food portion of the bill (tax, gratuity and alcohol are excluded) and is based on the number of guests in your party; for example 2 people dining receive a discount of 50% off, 3 people dining 33% off, 4 people dining 25% off and so on. Not valid with any other promotion, offer or discount.

Name: Pretzel Bell
Description: On your birthday, if you are dining in - you get a small Pretzel Bell (literally, a small bell) and a coupon for $10 off your next visit. Expires in one month.

Name: Quarter Bistro
Description: From their online menu... "BIRTHDAYS ON US Join us on your birthday and receive a free dinner with the purchase of a second dinner of equal or lesser value.

Name: Real Seafood Company
Description: On day of birthday with valid ID - driver's license for adults and/or birth certificate for children. Offer only extends to the food portion of the bill (tax, gratuity and alcohol are excluded) and is based on the number of guests in your party; for example 2 people dining receive a discount of 50% off, 3 people dining 33% off, 4 people dining 25% off, etc.Â Dine-in only.Â Not valid with any other promotion, offer or discount. Valid all day, not just dinner.

Name: The Earle
Description: Offer only available on your birthday with valid ID - driver's license for adults and/or birth certificate for children. Offer only extends to the food portion of the bill (tax, gratuity and alcohol are excluded) and is based on the number of guests in your party; for example 2 people dining receive a discount of 50% off, 3 people dining one third off, 4 people dining one fourth off and so on. Not valid with any other promotion, offer or discount.

Name: Weber’s
Description: Buy 1 Entree, Get the second entree of equal or lesser value complimentary. Â Must be on the exact day of your birthday and present a photo ID.
